statements: UPDATE transaction_records SET amount = 100.50, timestamp = '2022-01-15 14:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

UPDATE transaction_records SET sender_address = 'Alice', receiver_address = 'Bob', amount = 500.75, timestamp = '2022-02-15 15:45:00' WHERE transaction_id = '987e6543-c21b-32d4-b654-234615748902';
UPDATE transaction_records SET amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE transaction_records SET from_address = 'Alice', to_address = 'Bob' WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';

UPDATE transaction_records SET from_address = 'Alice', to_address = 'Bob' WHERE amount = 1000.00;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50 WHERE transaction_id = 123456;
UPDATE addresses SET balance = 5000.75, address = '0x123abc' WHERE address_id = 987654;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 1000.50, transaction_timestamp = NOW() WHERE from_address = '0x1234567890123456' AND to_address = '0x9876543210987654';
UPDATE blocks SET miner_address = '0xaaaaabbbbbcccccdddddeeeee', num_transactions = num_transactions - 1 WHERE block_number = 1000;
UPDATE transaction_records SET amount = 5000.00, sender_address = '0x123456789', receiver_address = '0x987654321', timestamp = '2022-10-01 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = 15000.50, account_address = '0xAAAAAABBBBCCCC', account_id = 1001 WHERE account_id = 100;
UPDATE transaction_records SET amount = 500.00, sender_address = '123 Main St' WHERE transaction_id = 1001
UPDATE user_accounts SET account_balance = 1500.00 WHERE account_address = '456 Elm St'
UPDATE transaction_records SET amount = 500.55 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_accounts SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 98765;
UPDATE transaction_records SET amount = amount - 1000 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_accounts SET email = 'newemail@example.com', password_hash = 'newhash123' WHERE user_id = 98765;
